name: ZmnSCPxj jxPCSnmZ
cooked: Thanks. It looks like it is possible to have multiple splice txes in-flight, so it should be possible to just remove the offending channel from the batch, if you are willing to increase the feerate. But a batched splicing implementation does still need to monitor for this case.
raw: Thanks.  It looks like it is possible to have multiple splice txes in-flight, so it should be possible to just remove the offending channel from the batch, if you are willing to increase the feerate.  But a batched splicing implementation does still need to monitor for this case.
